original_text: Some people praise themselves. They say how clever they are. But we could never do that. We could not even try to be like those people. But they do not understand anything. They decide among themselves how good they are. They look at one another to see if they are better or worse.
korean_text: 우리는 자기를 칭찬하는 어떤 자와 더불어 감히 짝하며 비교할 수 없노라 그러나 그들이 자기로써 자기를 헤아리고 자기로써 자기를 비교하니 지혜가 없도다

sentences.original_text: They say how clever they are
But we could never do that
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 우리는 결코 그럴 수 없습니다

sentences.original_text: We could not even try to be like those people
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그런 사람들처럼 되려고조차 시도할 수 없습니다

sentences.original_text: But they do not understand anything
to see if they are better or worse
sentences.korean_translation: 더 나은지 더 못한지 알아보기 위해
